files.patch:
@@ -193,0 +193,7 @@ + *

+ * Set the value to {@code Boolean.FALSE} or an integer less than {@code 0} with + * {@link #setOption(int, Object)} to disable this option. An integer greater than or equal to + * {@code 0} will enable the option and will represent the linger timeout. + *

+ * If this option is enabled then {@link #getOption(int)} will return an integer value + * representing the linger timeout, else the return value will be {@code Boolean.FALSE}.
